data.title: Mind Definition & Meaning
data.meta_description: MIND meaning: 1 : the part of a person that thinks, reasons, feels, and remembers; 2 : used to describe the way a person thinks or the intelligence of a person
data.text:
a meeting of (the) minds

— see meeting

at/in the back of your mind

— see 1back

blow someone's mind

informal

call/bring (something) to mind

change someone's mind

change your mind

come/spring/leap to mind

concentrate the/your mind

— see 1concentrate

cross someone's mind

— see 2cross

enter your mind

— see enter

give someone a piece of your mind

have a good mind

or have half a mind

have a mind like a sieve

— see 1sieve

have a mind of your own

in your mind's eye

— see 1eye

know your own mind

— see 1know

make up your mind

mind over matter

of two minds

(US) or British in two minds

open your mind

— see 2open

put (someone) in mind of (something)

put/set your mind to (something)

read someone's mind

speak your mind
